001
002import java.io.File;
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Collections;
005import java.util.Comparator;
006import java.util.List;
007
008/**
009 * find duplicates
010 *
011 * @author matecsaba
012 */
013public class duplicates implements Comparator<String> {
014
015    /**
016     * the main
017     *
018     * @param args arguments
019     */
020    public static void main(String[] args) {
021        String s = args[0];
022        playerUtil.put("reading " + s + "...");
023        String[] l1 = new File(s).list();
024        List<String> lst = new ArrayList<String>();
025        for (int i = 0; i < l1.length; i++) {
026            lst.add(l1[i]);
027        }
028        Collections.sort(lst, new duplicates());
029        s = "<null>";
030        for (int i = 0; i < lst.size(); i++) {
031            String a = lst.get(i).toLowerCase();
032            if (a.startsWith(s)) {
033                playerUtil.put(s);
034            }
035            s = a;
036        }
037    }
038
039    public int compare(String o1, String o2) {
040        return o1.compareTo(o2);
041    }
042
043}
